Our Services

Construction

We construct all forms of buildings ranging from apartments , offices , estates , buildings and so on. All our projects follows industry specification.

Dredging And Pilling

With recognition from international based companies, our dredging and pilling works can only be matched by a few. Our finished projects has provided accesss and protection for various shoreline communities.

Maintainance

At Dapskic we provide maintainance service for already established projects. We reconstruct and modernize outdated structures. Ensuring all constructions conform to industry standards makes our Maintainance service a delight to our clients

Consultation

Get all the help and resource you need to complete your project. Inquire from us and we will give you all the valuable feedback you need.
